Preparatory Committee Inaugurated in Democratic Congo 
    Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the Democratic Congo National Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Day of the Sun was held at the National University of Kinshasa on March 4.
 The secretary general of the National Executive Committee of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and Democracy of Democratic Congo was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee set a period from March 4 to April 16 for commemoration and decided to hold colorful political and cultural functions in this period.

Credentials Presented to Kim Yong Nam by New Moroccan Ambassador
    Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Mohamed Cherti, new Moroccan ambassador e. p. to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Choe Su Hon was on hand.    
 After receiving credentials, the president conversed with the ambassador.
